Digital Weighing Machine Repair Display !

Matching IC of main machine and display.

IC: SD5209X1

Ic Pin NoIc Pin type
3Serial Clock signal (SCL)
4Serial Data Acquisition (SDA)
not output icVoltage Common Collector (VCC)
not output icGround (GND)

Dispaly Ic

IC: Gn1640

Ic Pin NoIc Pin type
7Serial Clock signal (SCL)
8Serial Data Acquisition (SDA)
26Voltage Common Collector (VCC)
6Ground (GND)

Poblem Solved to Run This Command!

  • Follow The tabel and join Cabel!

    • Ic Pin NoIc Pin type
    7 + 3(SCL) + SCL
    8 + 4(SDA) + SDA
    26 + Add The 3.76V Dc Line (+)(VCC) + Dc 3.76V(+)
    6 + add The Body Ground Line (-)(GND) = (-)

  • Factory Reconstruction and New Calculation System Follow this command!

    • Follow the main PCB border and see the Bajr Side 2 Pin Open Hold 2 Pin and Auto Re-launch. And Power On.
